headline: IFF’s Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials™ Platform Sees First Large-Scale Use in Home Care Applications
summary: NEW YORK, September 04, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF) — a global leader in flavors, fragrances, food ingredients, health and biosciences — announced the first large-scale commercial use of its Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials™ (DEB) platform, as a major consumer packaged goods (CPG) company has launched a new laundry detergent formulation enhanced by DEB technology.
